The non-conceptual and the vast fruit are in one place.
Therefore, they are not mentioned separately.
With these sixteen,
together with the previous ones, they are combined into thirty-six abodes.
The four heavens of the formless realm,
together with the previous ones, make forty.
If we divide the form realm,
separately into the great Brahma and the non-conceptual heaven,
then the abodes
number forty-two.
